title: ISic004292. I.Sicily inscription 004292
body:
Facsimile Images

ἄρχουσιν
[Σ]κρειβωνίοις Νωμεντανῷ καὶ Μοδέστῳ
------


5

Apparatus criticus

Text of lines 1-2 after Meligunis-Lipara XII; the area below is worn; and editors to date have declined to read the final three illegible lines at the base of the stone.

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • 795 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
  • Libertini 1921 220 no.22 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001875
  • Bitto and Caliri 2018 25-27 fig. 1-2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002255
